grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 弄火【ロウカ】playing with fire, flirting
嘲弄【チョウロウ】scorn, mockery, ridicule
戯弄【ギロウ】teasing, toying with somebody's emotions
kun reading compounds: 弄くる【いじくる】to finger, to tamper (with)
弄する【ろうする】to play with, to joke, to use (esp. trick, sophistry, etc.), to deride, to scoff at, to make fun of

弄る【いじる】to finger, to touch, to play with, to fiddle with, to toy with, to make changes to, to tinker with, to tamper with, to dabble in, to do as a hobby, to play around with, to grope, to feel around (in one's pocket, bag, etc.)
弄ぶ【もてあそぶ】to play with (a toy, one's hair, etc.), to fiddle with, to toy with (one's emotions, etc.), to trifle with, to do with something as one pleases, to appreciate
